column2: "Hey, you there. Have you seen a rare weapon in this area?"
"Oh, you haven't? It's just that my friend is a weapon smith who seems to have lost himself."
"I wanted to ask him to make me a weapon, but it looks like he's just given up."
"I thought that maybe if I showed him a special weapon, it might bring him back to his senses."
"It doesn't need to be a completed weapon, just something with potential."
"If you find something along those lines, please try showing it to him."
"If you see a stern-looking cast lingering around in the lobby, that's probably him."
"Sorry for taking up your time. I wish us both luck in finding something."
